description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Shah of Persia's visit to West Germany; German President's tour of Asia; dramatic rescue of 11 trapped miners; Berliners welcome new federal Chancellor; traditional bronze casting methods are used to reproduce statues; a tour of Regensberg; using Telstar for international telephone conversations; the grace of bowlers at Dusseldorf.
